form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Blunt (for himself, Mr. Manchin, and Mr. Enzi) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To prohibit the Federal Government from requiring race or ethnicity to be disclosed in connection with the transfer of a firearm.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Firearm Act of 2015.

section.header: Prohibition on the Federal Government requiring race or ethnicity to be disclosed in connection with the transfer of a firearm
section.text: The Federal Government may not require any person to disclose the race or ethnicity of the person in connection with the transfer of a firearm to the person.
